alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 1:26PM PST until March 01 at 8:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...San Diego County Valleys above 2500 feet. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 8 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Scattered snow showers are possible in the far inland valleys near the foothills of the mountains during the late afternoon and early evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
